Articles.Content: After a good hour of selecting and installing and then waiting for the textures compression, when i finally see the game... Nothing, no clouds, no better atmospheres, no lens flares, no first person, NOTHING, the game seems to ignore the mods ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) then i did all the same with the previous version, 0.25, and the same thing happened. help.

> 
> After a good hour of selecting and installing and then waiting for the textures compression, when i finally see the game... Nothing, no clouds, no better atmospheres, no lens flares, no first person, NOTHING, the game seems to ignore the mods ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) then i did all the same with the previous version, 0.25, and the same thing happened. help.

Post a screenshot of how you installed the mods, you may have installed them improperly.

it should look like:

Steamapps>Common>KSP>Gamedata>Unzipped mods if you use steam

or KSP>Gamedata>Unzipped mods if no steam
What do i do with it?
Most modifications require the plugin module manager which can be found with a quick google search
Anyway, i installed module manager, and there are no mods still. Everything is there, but the game just ignores the mods. I've tested it on both .90 and .25, nothing works.
